alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Leon; Madison; Taylor; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 3:47PM EDT until July 22 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... West central Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 346 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Monticello to near Woodville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodville, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Newport, Cody, Shadeville, Hells Half Acre, Wakulla Springs, Lamont, Nash, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Drifton, Scanlon, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Natural Bridge and Goose Pasture. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
